description: Presenting a template ready to use for a simple Django application in a Docker container environment. The code is available here /redirect?event=video_description&v=oMQh6Qk5Egw&redir_token=CRo5tXr6jCOT0m-6WyhrUWOnNcN8MTUxOTU2NzAwOEAxNTE5NDgwNjA4&q=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fjaimebuelta%2Fdjango-docker-template and the talk will walk through some of the caveats and tricks of working in a useful Docker environment.
title: A Django project template for a RESTful Application using Docker -Jaime Buelta
